member.name: T:ValueConversion.Ef6.CastMap
member.summary: A class for holding and looking up information what type was converted into which type in the expression.

member.name: P:ValueConversion.Ef6.ConversionConfiguration.IsAllowedForColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate that determines if a CLR type can be used as an alias of a DB column type. This is heavily dependent on EF6, see allowed casts CLR types in ExpressionConverter.GetCastTargetType. For primitive types (that is not every type, e.g. ), see EF6 source ClrProviderManifest.TryGetPrimitiveTypeKind for a list of allowed types in EF6 as a column.
member.remarks: This has a preference, if this says it can be materialized, it is put into the mediator type.

member.name: P:ValueConversion.Ef6.ConversionConfiguration.ShouldMediateTargetProperty
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate that determines if a mediator should contain a propery with same name as the target.

member.name: P:ValueConversion.Ef6.ConversionConfiguration.MaxRecursion
member.summary: Gets a recursion limit that detects endless cycles, e.g. when looking for a connected graph to translate. First level is 0, once level is greater that MaxRecursion, throw.

member.name: T:ValueConversion.Ef6.MaterializedTypesVisitor
member.summary: A visitor that goes through a query expression and finds all types used in the query.

member.name: P:ValueConversion.Ef6.MaterializedTypesVisitor.MaterializedTypes
member.summary: Gets the list of types used in the materialization.

member.name: M:ValueConversion.Ef6.MediatorMapper.AddMediatorTypeMap(ValueConversion.Ef6.MediatorTypeMap)
member.summary: Mutable because we add types as new expressions are translated.

member.name: T:ValueConversion.Ef6.MediatorTypeBuilder
member.summary: A builder that creates new anonymous types based on domain entities. The mediator type will have same properties as EF entity, but their type will be a primitive type (according to Edm), not domain type (e.g. string instead of SerialNumber).

member.name: F:ValueConversion.Ef6.MediatorTypeBuilder._typeConverters
member.summary: List of custom typef for member, anything not found here is just passed through without type change.

member.name: T:ValueConversion.Ef6.MediatorTypeMap
member.summary: A representation of map target - mediator. Inheritance not counted, table per concrete type.

member.name: M:ValueConversion.Ef6.MediatorTypeMap.ConvertToMediator(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Convert a property of the target type into a property of the mediator type.
member.param: A property of a target type.

member.name: T:ValueConversion.Ef6.TargetTypeGraph
member.summary: This finds the graph, all nodes and edges that must be translated. It doesn't do the translation, it only finds what must be translated.

member.name: F:ValueConversion.Ef6.TargetTypeGraph._graph
member.summary: Key is node, represented by type, value are directed graphs edges (name of member and type target). Nodes should be translated. Edges can point either to a node or a .

member.name: F:ValueConversion.Ef6.TargetTypeGraph._keep
member.summary: Types that shouldn't be translated, e.g. , . doesn't have nodes for these types, but edges point to them.
